name: DDR Club
description: Dance Dance Revolution club is a place for students to relax and play DDR with friends. DDR is a way to be active while playing rhythm games.

officers.name: Dearborn Plys dplys@cps.edu, Piper Macdonald pmacdonald@cps.edu

announcements.title: Meetings
announcements.description: Club meetings take place Fridays from 3:30 to 4:30 in Ms. Simon's Room.
